purpose: Identify most likely cardholders to receive upgrade offers
title: Case Study: Identify most likely cardholders to receive upgrade offers

bullets.text: Background: Large issuer in Brazil has 3 tiers of credit products: Standard, Gold, Platinum and Black
Client Problem Statement: Client asked Mastercard to develop multiple upgrade models that predict which card should be offered to existent clients to keep or increase their usage behavior
Executed Solutions: 1. Analyze the overall portfolio and create usage profiles by product
2. Develop 5 look-a-like models that identify behavior patterns of similarity using banks own data as well as market’s behavior for development purposes
3. Based on the model scores provide recommendations for periodic upgrade campaigns
